about_the_game:
YOU ARE THE DUNGEON BOSS.

  • Pick your Dungeon Boss among a lineup of unique playable Characters (with more to come)

  • Quick and Addictive Runs (< 30 minutes)

  • Endless Replayability: Forge your own build from a big variety of Attacks, Weapons, Active Powers, Items, and Minions

  • Emergent Gameplay: Discover unique synergies and dive into wild theorycrafting

  • Wave-Based Carnage: Survive increasingly intense raids of Noobs, ranging from 20 to 90 seconds

  • Level Up and Shop: Collect souls from fallen Noobs to level up, and spend them on powerful upgrades between waves.

  • Cute and Badass artstyle

  • Dark Fantasy Parody RPG Universe

  • Banger OST

  • Playable in singleplayer and in multiplayer

  • 4 players Local Co-op Mode

  • Steam Remote Play Together feature support

BE YOUR OWN BOSS:

  • Play as a Overpowered Demon, a Giant Spider Boss, a Flying Dark-Magic Tome or any of the unique characters offering a wide range of playstyle

  • Opt for a Summoner playstyle and invoke swarms of Minions

  • Break the game: Push your “Amount” stat to absurd levels and watch the screen explode with chaos.

  • Go BIG AND EVIL: Smash entires groups of Noobs in 1 strike with devastating powers like Giant Wrecking Ball or Jump Impact

NOOBS ARE COMING!           SHOW THEM WHO'S THE BOSS

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Noobs Are Coming

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas lícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: YOU ARE THE FINAL BOSS. Brutal arena roguelike where you crush waves of noobs. Pick from a roster of unique Boss characters, wield tons of weapons, summon minions, and unleash overpowered abilities to create unique and unstoppable builds!
